attributes.action: Allow Restaurants & Cafes To Re-open in Aberdeen
attributes.additional_details: The introduction of this discount scheme, successfully encouraged a large number of diners to come out for eating. This was such a successful scheme, giving businesses in Hospitality sector a really good boost of confidence after a prolonged period of no income.
attributes.background: We are kindly requesting the local and central Government to help us in Aberdeen, by allowing restaurants and cafes to reopen and by extending the discount scheme for the time we have lost.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the Scottish Government and Parliament.

You can find out more about petitioning the Scottish Parliament here:

https://www.parliament.scot/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
